org.apache.giraph.utils

类 DynamicChannelBufferInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.DynamicChannelBufferInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DataInput

    public class DynamicChannelBufferInputStream
extends Object
implements DataInput
    Special input that reads from a DynamicChannelBuffer.
